title: Nugegoda Luxury House Urgent Sale
details: House In Nugegoda Next To Sarasavi Book Shop, 50m To Stanley Thilakaratne Rd, Land Extent 8.5 Perches, Fully Tiled (2'x2'), Sqft 3250, Two Story House With 5 Bedrooms And 4 Bathrooms With Hot Water And One Bedroom With Air-condition, 4 To 5 Vehicles Can Be Parked At The Promises. Property With Coc ( Completion Of Certificate From Uc Pitakotte) And Under A Bank Loan. Asking Price 35m ..no Brokers ..call 0714473540
